The Time-Worn Spire.description: Forged in honor of Silimar, and persistence in the face of impossible odds.
The Time-Worn Spire.name: The Time-Worn Spire

Prometheus Lens.description: "Cryptarchs made a crystal that starts fires? Get me one. I don't care how you do it. Go!" —Cayde-6
Prometheus Lens.name: Prometheus Lens

Controlling Vision.description: "Once you see how the balance is tipped against us—once you see doom coming, inexorable and cold—then you must act." —Arach Jalaal
Controlling Vision.name: Controlling Vision

Eleventh Hour.description: "We will save and protect anyone who joins Dead Orbit. There is a place on our ships for you." —Arach Jalaal
Eleventh Hour.name: Eleventh Hour

Ancient Gospel.description: "These forces have existed forever, but only one of them speaks to us." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3
Ancient Gospel.name: Ancient Gospel

Traveler's Chosen.description: A City-made sidearm, built for those chosen by the Traveler to become Guardians.
Traveler's Chosen.name: Traveler's Chosen

Traveler's Chosen (Damaged).description: A City-made sidearm, built for those chosen by the Traveler to become Guardians.
Traveler's Chosen (Damaged).name: Traveler's Chosen (Damaged)

Good Bone Structure.description: This one is a real looker.
Good Bone Structure.name: Good Bone Structure

Avalanche.description: If they're close enough to see it start, then they'd better run.
Avalanche.name: Avalanche

Drang (Baroque).description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.
Drang (Baroque).name: Drang (Baroque)

Gunnora's Axe.description: "She taught us all to appreciate a good, sturdy axe." —Lord Saladin
Gunnora's Axe.name: Gunnora's Axe

Shining Sphere.description: Above the cloud with its shadow is the star with its light.
Shining Sphere.name: Shining Sphere

Curtain Call.description: It's time for the final bow.
Curtain Call.name: Curtain Call

Luna's Howl.description: "Guardians never die. But we don't forget those who do." —Lord Shaxx
Luna's Howl.name: Luna's Howl

Not Forgotten.description: "Guardians never die. But we don't forget those who do." —Lord Shaxx
Not Forgotten.name: Not Forgotten

Requiem-45.description: Requiem-45: SUROS invites you to honor the dead.
Requiem-45.name: Requiem-45

Machina Dei 4.description:
A charnel but effulgent orb—beacon in a loathsome dark—
Fêted, fetid corpses rise—a too-long-absent gibbous spark.
Machina Dei 4.name: Machina Dei 4

Infinite Paths 8.description:
They sowed the First, now reap the Last; forever narrows to a line
Where Light will fade into the past—when all's converted, nothing shines.
Infinite Paths 8.name: Infinite Paths 8

CALUS Mini-Tool.description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.
CALUS Mini-Tool.name: CALUS Mini-Tool

The Long Walk.description: "There is an end to everything." —Emissary of the Nine
The Long Walk.name: The Long Walk

Redrix's Claymore.description: "On the ladder and in the fight, momentum is the answer."
Redrix's Claymore.name: Redrix's Claymore

Malfeasance.description: "Nothing kills a Guardian faster than another Guardian." —The Drifter
Malfeasance.name: Malfeasance

Premonition.description: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.
Premonition.name: Premonition

Edge Transit.description: What did you trade away to secure passage to the edge?
Edge Transit.name: Edge Transit

Interregnum XVI.description: "Until a ruler arises, we act as simple trustees. Protecting. Receiving. Executing." —Executor Hideo
Interregnum XVI.name: Interregnum XVI

Impromptu-49.description: SUROS invites you to be spontaneous.
Impromptu-49.name: Impromptu-49

Warden's Law.description: Fight. Win. Li- Li- Li- Li- Li- FATAL EXCEPTION HAS OCCURRED AT 0028:C001E36
Warden's Law.name: Warden's Law

Dead Zone Rifle.description: A rusted rifle you found in the EDZ mine. It's old, but it still works.
Dead Zone Rifle.name: Dead Zone Rifle

Frontier Justice.description: "…and after that, there will be time for questions."
Frontier Justice.name: Frontier Justice

Hagakure.description: The way of the warrior is death.
Hagakure.name: Hagakure

Negative Space.description: See the art in what's subtracted.
Negative Space.name: Negative Space

Complex Solution.description: A quantum algorithm, like a sword stroke, must be repeated until the solution is certain.
Complex Solution.name: Complex Solution

Unspoken Promise.description: The promise is in the point of the blade.
Unspoken Promise.name: Unspoken Promise

The Vision.description: Glory in the damage the right blast can do.
The Vision.name: The Vision

Terran Wind.description: "The Great Machine isn't killing us. We're killing ourselves over the Great Machine." —Brivi, transl. from Eliksni
Terran Wind.name: Terran Wind

Through Fire and Flood.description: The passage to the Shore is not an easy road.
Through Fire and Flood.name: Through Fire and Flood

Roar of the Bear.description: "Silimar's defense broke more assaults than not. His retribution would shake the ground." —Lord Saladin
Roar of the Bear.name: Roar of the Bear

Breakneck.description: "They don't make Dark Age tech like this anymore. Lucky for you I kept all mine." —The Drifter
Breakneck.name: Breakneck

Darkest Before.description: "Persevere, or die in darkness. The choice is yours." —Emissary of the Nine
Darkest Before.name: Darkest Before

Waking Vigil.description: "We have a duty to this solar system that goes deeper than blood, deeper than oaths." —Paladin Devi Cassl
Waking Vigil.name: Waking Vigil

Nightshade.description: Three drops is all it takes.
Nightshade.name: Nightshade

Nergal PR4.description: Take arms against the lions of death, the kings of sunset.
Nergal PR4.name: Nergal PR4

Retold Tale.description: "It's what gets left out, what gets reemphasized that you have to pay attention to." —Esila, daughter of Sila
Retold Tale.name: Retold Tale

Dream Breaker.description: "Broken dreams are all I have left. Why should they be any different?" —Eris Morn
Dream Breaker.name: Dream Breaker

True Prophecy.description: "Some claim to know the future better than we do. Listen carefully. Then ask yourself: do their words ring true or false?" —Lakshmi-2
True Prophecy.name: True Prophecy

Jötunn.description: "Untamed. Destructive. As forceful and chaotic as Ymir himself." —Ada-1
Jötunn.name: Jötunn

Mos Epoch III.description: The perpetual eventually gives way to the variable.
Mos Epoch III.name: Mos Epoch III

Blue Shift.description: What is the color of the universe?
Blue Shift.name: Blue Shift

The Jade Rabbit.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"
The Jade Rabbit.name: The Jade Rabbit

Garden Progeny 1.description:
Two siblings cleaved by time and space, reflections never found alone,
The ending of the eldritch race—a path long seen but never known.
Garden Progeny 1.name: Garden Progeny 1

Guiding Star.description: "We will make a new home out among the stars, and then we will know peace. Until that day..." —Arach Jalaal
Guiding Star.name: Guiding Star

First In, Last Out.description: "I don't know how it works. You just keep taking damage and keep firing."
First In, Last Out.name: First In, Last Out

Beidenhander.description: Let the song of the monarch be heard!
Beidenhander.name: Beidenhander

Black Scorpion-4sr.description: I attack from the shadows. I never miss.
Black Scorpion-4sr.name: Black Scorpion-4sr

BrayTech Werewolf.description: The right weapon can transform you.
BrayTech Werewolf.name: BrayTech Werewolf

Forte-15.description: SUROS invites you to get loud.
Forte-15.name: Forte-15

Daystar SMG2.description: A Guardian is a sunrise over darkness.
Daystar SMG2.name: Daystar SMG2

Resonance-42.description: SUROS invites you to strike a chord.
Resonance-42.name: Resonance-42

Antiope-D.description: They look to you to save them.
Antiope-D.name: Antiope-D

Phosphorus MG4.description: The star in the east, the fire in the dawn.
Phosphorus MG4.name: Phosphorus MG4

Chattering Bone.description: We have so much to discuss, o seeker mine.
Chattering Bone.name: Chattering Bone

Throne-Cleaver.description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.
Throne-Cleaver.name: Throne-Cleaver

Death's Razor.description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.
Death's Razor.name: Death's Razor

Goldtusk.description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.
Goldtusk.name: Goldtusk

Wendigo GL3.description: Turn your hunger outward, never inward.
Wendigo GL3.name: Wendigo GL3

Loaded Question.description: Hey. You see Cayde around, tell him his gun's ready. —Banshee-44
Loaded Question.name: Loaded Question

Dire Promise.description: "If you think this world ends well, you are mistaken." —Arach Jalaal
Dire Promise.name: Dire Promise

One Small Step.description: "Humanity once dreamt of walking on the Moon. Such innocence." —Eris Morn
One Small Step.name: One Small Step

Age-Old Bond.description: Symbiosis. Not predation. Never predation, o wary one mine.
Age-Old Bond.name: Age-Old Bond

Jorum's Claw.description: "He was more wolf than Human, we used to say." —Lord Saladin
Jorum's Claw.name: Jorum's Claw

Jian 7 Rifle.description: Come, brothers and sisters! Let us make way for the new ruler!
Jian 7 Rifle.name: Jian 7 Rifle

Dust Rock Blues.description: "No job too tough, if the price is good." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz
Dust Rock Blues.name: Dust Rock Blues

Tigerspite.description: "What else can we do but take up arms?" —Corsair Amrita Vae
Tigerspite.name: Tigerspite

Ballyhoo Mk.27.description: Prepare to back up your boasts.
Ballyhoo Mk.27.name: Ballyhoo Mk.27

Lamia HC2.description: Make your enemy's strength your own.
Lamia HC2.name: Lamia HC2

Allegro-34.description: SUROS invites you to pick up the pace.
Allegro-34.name: Allegro-34

Nation of Beasts.description: I can show you how we were in our prime. You need only ask, o student mine.
Nation of Beasts.name: Nation of Beasts

Revoker.description: When they have your back to the wall, when all seems lost—steel yourself! Command your future!
Revoker.name: Revoker

The Supremacy.description: "He didn't recognize me, at the end." —Jolyon Till the Rachis
The Supremacy.name: The Supremacy

Trust.description: "Worlds end. And when yours does, make sure you have a partner you can rely on." —The Drifter
Trust.name: Trust

Finite Impactor.description: Do not say a little in many words—say a great deal in a few.
Finite Impactor.name: Finite Impactor

Restoration VIII.description: "We need proper tools if we are to rebuild." —Executor Hideo
Restoration VIII.name: Restoration VIII

Vinegaroon-2si.description: I seek my prey in the shadows.
Vinegaroon-2si.name: Vinegaroon-2si

Dissonance-34.description: SUROS invites you to revel in the conflict.
Dissonance-34.name: Dissonance-34

BrayTech RWP Mk. II.description:
"Stress feedback tests proved successful. We have a solid production-line model on our hands."
—A. Bray
BrayTech RWP Mk. II.name: BrayTech RWP Mk. II

Hawthorne's Field-Forged Shotgun.description: "What am I supposed to put here? 'It's a gun. Kill bad guys with it.'" —Suraya Hawthorne
Hawthorne's Field-Forged Shotgun.name: Hawthorne's Field-Forged Shotgun

Baligant.description: Defend that which is precious to you.
Baligant.name: Baligant

Doomsday.description: The age-old chant: The end of days draws nigh.
Doomsday.name: Doomsday

Peace by Consensus.description: "The Consensus is bigger than the Speaker. Bigger than any of us. It will survive, because it has to." —Commander Zavala, acting head of the Consensus
Peace by Consensus.name: Peace by Consensus

The Day's Fury.description: Forged in honor of Radegast, and righteous rage born anew.
The Day's Fury.name: The Day's Fury

Wish-Ender.description: "Don't fret. It's a simple expedition. We'll be back before lunch." —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath
Wish-Ender.name: Wish-Ender

Trinity Ghoul.description: "I couldn't afford to miss. Not when it was his life on the line." —Marin Mansanas, Tangled Outrider
Trinity Ghoul.name: Trinity Ghoul

Gnawing Hunger.description: Don't let pride keep you from a good meal.
Gnawing Hunger.name: Gnawing Hunger

Edgewise.description: Don't let them get a word in.
Edgewise.name: Edgewise

Polaris Lance.description: "I've forgotten so much of my past life, of my family. But when I hold this rifle, everything feels right. I feel like… I'm home." —Ana Bray
Polaris Lance.name: Polaris Lance

Acantha-D.description: Your piercing Light knows no limits; your searcher's heart, no bounds.
Acantha-D.name: Acantha-D

Tango-45.description: SUROS invites you to be passionate.
Tango-45.name: Tango-45

Manannan SR4.description: Escort your foes to their defeat.
Manannan SR4.name: Manannan SR4

The Wizened Rebuke.description: Forged in honor of Skorri, of lessons learned and lessons taught.
The Wizened Rebuke.name: The Wizened Rebuke

Allied Demand.description: Rest satisfied with doing well, and leave others to talk of you as they please.
Allied Demand.name: Allied Demand

Silicon Neuroma.description: "My future is concurrently irreversible and unknowable. Before it overtakes me, I desire a more abrupt end to those responsible." —Asher Mir
Silicon Neuroma.name: Silicon Neuroma

Timelines' Vertex.description: "I give you this, to be sure that we meet again." —Lakshmi-2
Timelines' Vertex.name: Timelines' Vertex

It Stared Back.description: At the edge of the universe, I stared into the infinite deep. It stared back, and was pleased. I would become the herald of its victory, and bear witness for all creation.
It Stared Back.name: It Stared Back

Horror's Least.description: "Some things should not be saved." —Techeun Sedia
Horror's Least.name: Horror's Least

The Doubt.description: "Do not fear your doubts. Fight your doubts. Honor them as you would honor your enemies." —Lakshmi-2
The Doubt.name: The Doubt

Sole Survivor.description: Names mean nothing to the dead.
Sole Survivor.name: Sole Survivor

Midnight Coup.description: The conspirators were too afraid to kill me—rightly so. I am the beloved father of the people, and the glorious mob would not suffer my death. My sentence was exile.
Midnight Coup.name: Midnight Coup

Vacuna SR4.description: A toast to our love for danger. Fear makes victory ever sweeter.
Vacuna SR4.name: Vacuna SR4

Redrix's Broadsword.description: The second swing is no less deadly.
Redrix's Broadsword.name: Redrix's Broadsword

Adhortative.description: "So... you think you can kill a god?" —Ghost
Adhortative.name: Adhortative

Tranquility.description: "They think violence will bring peace. Maybe it can." —Eris Morn
Tranquility.name: Tranquility

Tongeren-LR3.description: Long march. Stone road. Old city. Know the land.
Tongeren-LR3.name: Tongeren-LR3

Damietta-LR2.description: Taut sails. Wide rivers. Battered towers. Watch the seas.
Damietta-LR2.name: Damietta-LR2

Aachen-LR2.description: Old kings. Sharp swords. Epic songs. Take the throne.
Aachen-LR2.name: Aachen-LR2

Agrona PR4.description: Do not be afraid. Our fate cannot be taken from us. It is a gift.
Agrona PR4.name: Agrona PR4

Battle Scar.description: "Do not concern yourself with how many horns I bear." —Lord Shaxx
Battle Scar.name: Battle Scar

Thin Line.description: Sometimes you forget which side you're on.
Thin Line.name: Thin Line

Quickfang.description: My smile is full of blades.
Quickfang.name: Quickfang

Eternity's Edge.description: "A sword is a wand that casts two spells: parry and cut." —Tarsem Sauer
Eternity's Edge.name: Eternity's Edge

Crown-Splitter.description: "Our enemies think themselves gods and kings. Show them the error of their ways." —Callisto Yin
Crown-Splitter.name: Crown-Splitter

The Steady Hand.description: Forged in honor of Perun, and a just and unwavering resolve.
The Steady Hand.name: The Steady Hand

Sondok-C.description: Your wisdom will lead you to victory.
Sondok-C.name: Sondok-C

The Showrunner.description: Once you have one, you'll wonder how you ever did without.
The Showrunner.name: The Showrunner

A Fine Memorial.description: "Thousands of Guardians fell to Crota and the Hive. Thousands." —Eris Morn
A Fine Memorial.name: A Fine Memorial

Nasreddin.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.
Nasreddin.name: Nasreddin

Gravity Slingshot.description: "On the day our ships are ready, the City will see us blast into the sky." —Arach Jalaal
Gravity Slingshot.name: Gravity Slingshot

Claws of the Wolf.description: "Perun's strikes would hit so fast and true that our enemies wouldn't realize their fate until it was too late." —Lord Saladin
Claws of the Wolf.name: Claws of the Wolf

Furina-2mg.description: I am ready to defend my territory.
Furina-2mg.name: Furina-2mg

Harmony-21.description: SUROS reminds you that a fireteam is better than a soloist.
Harmony-21.name: Harmony-21

Gahlran's Right Hand.description: "A Reefborn autorifle, rewritten with Hive voices to defend Gahlran the failed. Now yours." —Emperor Calus
Gahlran's Right Hand.name: Gahlran's Right Hand

Recital-17.description: SUROS reminds you that practice makes perfect.
Recital-17.name: Recital-17

Victoire SI2.description: Victory is a process, not a finality.
Victoire SI2.name: Victoire SI2

Retrofuturist.description: They were so optimistic about us.
Retrofuturist.name: Retrofuturist

Badlander.description: "We are a long way from home." —Arrha (trans. from Eliksni)
Badlander.name: Badlander

Perseverance.description: It was a long time coming. But it wasn't the wait. It was the journey.
Perseverance.name: Perseverance

MIDA Multi-Tool.description: Select application: Ballistic engagement. Entrenching tool. Avionics trawl. Troll smasher. Stellar sextant. List continues.
MIDA Multi-Tool.name: MIDA Multi-Tool

Stochastic Variable.description: "However certain we are of our simulations, they always contain an element of unpredictability." —Lakshmi-2
Stochastic Variable.name: Stochastic Variable

Love and Death.description: "To the Hive, they are the same. Show them some love." —Eris Morn
Love and Death.name: Love and Death

Pleiades Corrector.description: "No, I don't think I'll tell you what it's for. That would be too easy." —Lakshmi-2
Pleiades Corrector.name: Pleiades Corrector

Coldheart.description: The latest Omolon engineering leverages liquid fuel as coolant to keep weapon systems at biting subzero temperatures.
Coldheart.name: Coldheart

Niflheim Frost.description: The chill you feel is death.
Niflheim Frost.name: Niflheim Frost

Breath of the Dragon.description: "Once Timur saw you, it was already over, whether they knew it or not." —Lord Saladin
Breath of the Dragon.name: Breath of the Dragon

The Last Word.description: "Yours, until the last flame dies and all words have been spoken." —Shin Malphur to you, as you journey forth into the unknown
The Last Word.name: The Last Word

Orimund's Anvil.description: "He was the first to forge arms for the Iron Banner." —Lord Saladin
Orimund's Anvil.name: Orimund's Anvil

Broadsword Launcher.description: Let our monarch's spirit ring out and roar!
Broadsword Launcher.name: Broadsword Launcher

Nox Reve II.description: In the dark of night we dream of the Light's return.
Nox Reve II.name: Nox Reve II

Nox Calyx II.description: Shed the husk of night and be reborn.
Nox Calyx II.name: Nox Calyx II

Agamid.description: The lumbering beast stands ready to fight.
Agamid.name: Agamid

Zenobia-D.description: You are the true power on the throne.
Zenobia-D.name: Zenobia-D

Interference VI.description: Come between your enemies and their lives.
Interference VI.name: Interference VI

Rest for the Wicked.description: Let them sleep. For a long, long time.
Rest for the Wicked.name: Rest for the Wicked

Tatara Gaze.description: The fire in your eyes reveals all truths.
Tatara Gaze.name: Tatara Gaze

Fussed Dark Mk.21.description: Sun's hanging low in the sky.
Fussed Dark Mk.21.name: Fussed Dark Mk.21

Botheration Mk.28.description: Be a pain in their side.
Botheration Mk.28.name: Botheration Mk.28

Badlands Mk.24.description: Place like this ain't home to the faint of heart.
Badlands Mk.24.name: Badlands Mk.24

Duty Bound.description: "Due respect, Commander? I was there when the Hive found us on Earth. I was there when we stopped them on Titan. And I'll be there when we wipe them out." —Sloane
Duty Bound.name: Duty Bound

Escape Velocity.description: "The first step toward truth is to let go of all that we know and hold dear." —Arach Jalaal
Escape Velocity.name: Escape Velocity

Future Safe 10.description:
See who's robed as if a god, who stands with pride above the rest!
Destroy this ancient nameless fraud! Destroy the one whose death was blessed!
Future Safe 10.name: Future Safe 10

Bane of Sorrow.description: "A Reefborn heavy implement, rewritten with Hive voices to make way for Gahlran the failed. Now yours." —Emperor Calus
Bane of Sorrow.name: Bane of Sorrow

King Cobra-4fr.description: Only fools dare enter my kingdom.
King Cobra-4fr.name: King Cobra-4fr

The Wardcliff Coil.description: Ingenuity. Desperation. A haphazard prototype of terrible power. Such were the factors at play in the Wardcliff Incident.
The Wardcliff Coil.name: The Wardcliff Coil

Swift Ride.description: It'll be over before you know it.
Swift Ride.name: Swift Ride

Disrespectful Stare.description: Don't you look at me that way!
Disrespectful Stare.name: Disrespectful Stare

Lincoln Green.description: The survivors of that day chose not to remember.
Lincoln Green.name: Lincoln Green

Halfdan-D.description: Your name will ring out, your deeds will resound forever.
Halfdan-D.name: Halfdan-D

Valakadyn.description: In dark water, my fangs are bared.
Valakadyn.name: Valakadyn

Eternal Slumber.description: "The night sky closes in. We should not be here when the final star fades." —Arach Jalaal
Eternal Slumber.name: Eternal Slumber

Athelflad-D.description: Make yourself dreadful to your enemies and indispensable to your allies.
Athelflad-D.name: Athelflad-D

Etana SI4.description: The reign of Light will be long and peaceful.
Etana SI4.name: Etana SI4

Urchin-3si.description: I will draw them in, then take them out.
Urchin-3si.name: Urchin-3si

Cerberus+1.description: "Because three heads are good, but four are better." —Jeza "Jeopardy" Verlayn
Cerberus+1.name: Cerberus+1

Hush.description: "Breathe. Line up the shot. Enjoy the quiet before the kill." —The Drifter
Hush.name: Hush

Three Graves.description: "No need to dig too deep. Our slumber will not be disturbed." —Arach Jalaal
Three Graves.name: Three Graves

Radiant Stardust.description: "We are but dust on a stellar wind." —Arach Jalaal
Radiant Stardust.name: Radiant Stardust

Presto-48.description: SUROS invites you to hold nothing back.
Presto-48.name: Presto-48

Khvostov 7G-02.description: An ancient instrument of war, battered and worn—but it still fires true. Perhaps it's been waiting for you.
Khvostov 7G-02.name: Khvostov 7G-02

Fixed Odds.description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.
Fixed Odds.name: Fixed Odds

Abide the Return.description: "It is what she asks of us." —Paladin Kamala Rior
Abide the Return.name: Abide the Return

Origin Story.description: Your inciting incident is their tragic ending.
Origin Story.name: Origin Story

Armillary PSu.description: What is the structure of the universe?
Armillary PSu.name: Armillary PSu

Black Tiger-2sr.description: I creep unseen through the darkness.
Black Tiger-2sr.name: Black Tiger-2sr

Trax Lysis II.description: You will destroy them one cell at a time.
Trax Lysis II.name: Trax Lysis II

Encore-25.description: SUROS invites you to get back on stage.
Encore-25.name: Encore-25

Agrona PR2.description: Defeat is inevitable… for someone. Make sure it isn't you.
Agrona PR2.name: Agrona PR2

Psi Cirrus II.description: Set your eyes on the sky.
Psi Cirrus II.name: Psi Cirrus II

Autumn Wind.description:
"I am the autumnal sun,
With autumn gales my race is run."
Autumn Wind.name: Autumn Wind

The Old Fashioned.description: This is the way things were.
The Old Fashioned.name: The Old Fashioned

Legend of Acrius.description: "In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabal… are not a subtle people." —Tyra Karn
Legend of Acrius.name: Legend of Acrius

BrayTech Winter Wolf.description: The leader of the pack endures through the harshest conditions.
BrayTech Winter Wolf.name: BrayTech Winter Wolf

Legal Action II.description: It's time to file a complaint.
Legal Action II.name: Legal Action II

Critical Sass.description: A chain reaction of nuclear insolence.
Critical Sass.name: Critical Sass

Hazard of the Cast.description: "Nothing for it once you place your life upon the die." —The Drifter
Hazard of the Cast.name: Hazard of the Cast

Dead-Ender.description: "I question the wisdom of our current trajectory." —Arach Jalaal
Dead-Ender.name: Dead-Ender

The End.description: "Show them that safe harbor is very far away." —Emissary of the Nine
The End.name: The End

Hollow Earth.description: "Do we need another reminder? This world is but a grave." —Arach Jalaal
Hollow Earth.name: Hollow Earth

Translation Theory.description: "Must consider new ways… What cannot change, dies…" —Variks, the Loyal
Translation Theory.name: Translation Theory

Smuggler's Word.description: A deal is a deal. Or so you hope.
Smuggler's Word.name: Smuggler's Word

Wavesplitter.description: Omolon's newest breakthrough uses focused sonic waves to superheat electrons into a devastating energy beam.
Wavesplitter.name: Wavesplitter

Worldline Zero.description: A single strike can alter the course of history.
Worldline Zero.name: Worldline Zero

The Hero's Burden.description: Forged in honor of Saladin, of all that has been lost and all  that remains.
The Hero's Burden.name: The Hero's Burden

Orewing's Maul.description: "They were the first to chart the Cosmodrome's mountains." —Lord Saladin
Orewing's Maul.name: Orewing's Maul

Elegy-49.description: SUROS invites you to bring about the end.
Elegy-49.name: Elegy-49

Reginar-B.description: You stand at the head of the army.
Reginar-B.name: Reginar-B

Cup-Bearer SA/2.description: Drink deep from the cup of destruction.
Cup-Bearer SA/2.name: Cup-Bearer SA/2

A Sudden Death.description: "Everything dies. This is proof." —Emissary of the Nine
A Sudden Death.name: A Sudden Death

Call to Serve.description: "We have to do more than ask for help, Suraya. We have to give them something to believe in."
Call to Serve.name: Call to Serve

Whisper of the Worm.description: A Guardian's power makes a rich feeding ground. Do not be revolted. There are parasites that may benefit the host… teeth sharper than your own.
Whisper of the Worm.name: Whisper of the Worm

Prosecutor.description: "All this in service of one purpose. You have their attention. Let us see if you can keep it." —Emissary of the Nine
Prosecutor.name: Prosecutor

Minimum Distance.description: All I need is a little breathing room.
Minimum Distance.name: Minimum Distance

Dead Man Walking.description: Before you? I just remember searching. What do you remember from before me?
Dead Man Walking.name: Dead Man Walking

Eternal Blazon.description: "But this eternal blazon must not be to ears of flesh and blood."
Eternal Blazon.name: Eternal Blazon

Archimedes Truth.description: The shortest distance between two points is a straight line.
Archimedes Truth.name: Archimedes Truth

Dark Decider.description: The oldest, shortest words—yes and no—are those which require the most thought.
Dark Decider.name: Dark Decider

Pluperfect.description: builds builds builds builds the past
Pluperfect.name: Pluperfect

Nameless Midnight.description: Strange things wake at the stroke of twelve.
Nameless Midnight.name: Nameless Midnight

Swarm of the Raven.description: "With enough altitude, Felwinter's destruction would blanket the field farther than you could see." —Lord Saladin
Swarm of the Raven.name: Swarm of the Raven

Stubborn Oak.description: A sturdy Shotgun forged by capable hands. It packs a punch.
Stubborn Oak.name: Stubborn Oak

Talons of the Eagle.description: "She soared above the battle and dove in the blink of an eye. If they were still alive, they were the unlucky ones." —Lord Saladin
Talons of the Eagle.name: Talons of the Eagle

Orthrus.description: Let slip the dogs of war.
Orthrus.name: Orthrus

Berenger's Memory.description: Take your place among the company of heroes.
Berenger's Memory.name: Berenger's Memory

Unification VII.description: "To persuade others, we must show that we act in their interests." —Executor Hideo
Unification VII.name: Unification VII

The Forward Path.description: Forged in honor of Weyloran, and roads yet traveled.
The Forward Path.name: The Forward Path

Distant Relation.description: "I like to keep my enemies where they can't reach me. I can always find a way to get to them if I have to." —The Drifter
Distant Relation.name: Distant Relation

Butler RS/2.description: A loyal servant, equipped to take care of even the biggest messes.
Butler RS/2.name: Butler RS/2

The Queenbreaker.description: Despite the Breakers' treachery, Her Majesty still stands.
The Queenbreaker.name: The Queenbreaker

One Thousand Voices.description: I can be anyone you wish, o murderer mine.
One Thousand Voices.name: One Thousand Voices

A Cold Sweat.description: "When the dreams begin, it is already too late." —Emissary of the Nine
A Cold Sweat.name: A Cold Sweat

Last of the Legion.description:
“Vex technology on Mercury. Energy on Mars. This system is rich in spoils if one knows where to look.” 
—Val Ca'uor
Last of the Legion.name: Last of the Legion

Traveler's Judgment 5.description:
A visitor ignites the sky, and in the truth of light it dreams:
Above the dead and yet-to-die, a legion's blade with fire screams.
Traveler's Judgment 5.name: Traveler's Judgment 5

Bad Reputation.description: "Here we can start over." —Mithrax, trans. from Eliksni
Bad Reputation.name: Bad Reputation

Duke Mk. 44.description: Slow to shoot, but brutal upon impact.
Duke Mk. 44.name: Duke Mk. 44

Arbalest.description: "We didn't have linear fusions in the Dark Age. But we made it work." —The Drifter
Arbalest.name: Arbalest

Optative.description: If only you could see yourself. But you have no eyes. Not the dimmest sense survives…
Optative.name: Optative

Bad News.description: Sit down. We need to talk.
Bad News.name: Bad News

Shattered Peace.description: Only you can make it whole again.
Shattered Peace.name: Shattered Peace

Annual Skate.description: "When the lake used to freeze, people would dance on the ice wearing boots with tiny swords. And fall in love."
Annual Skate.name: Annual Skate

Classical-42.description: SUROS invites you to bring back the classics.
Classical-42.name: Classical-42

Countess SA/2.description: A noble commander of the battlefield.
Countess SA/2.name: Countess SA/2

The Long Goodbye.description: "Yeah… I lost a lot of these out on Nessus. Long story. Lots of dead Vex." —The Drifter
The Long Goodbye.name: The Long Goodbye

Apostate.description: "Survival is our most holy writ. Heterodoxy will be its own undoing." —Kuldax
Apostate.name: Apostate

Wicked Sister.description: The bad influence in the family.
Wicked Sister.name: Wicked Sister

Bellowing Giant.description: Fate will hear your war cry.
Bellowing Giant.name: Bellowing Giant

Lonesome.description: Am I the only one who sees?
Lonesome.name: Lonesome

Telesto.description: Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.
Telesto.name: Telesto

Zealot's Reward.description: "Why not use these gifts we've been given?" —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3
Zealot's Reward.name: Zealot's Reward

Pariah.description: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.
Pariah.name: Pariah

Cadenza-11.description: A modded version of the Cadenza-43, a Guardian standby.
Cadenza-11.name: Cadenza-11

Standing Tall.description: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.
Standing Tall.name: Standing Tall

Deathbringer.description: "Sing them a lullaby of death and nothing more."
Deathbringer.name: Deathbringer

Perfect Paradox.description:
A tale that's different from the rest: the thread unfurls against the clocks.
The one the Speaker loved the best must have a perfect paradox.
Perfect Paradox.name: Perfect Paradox

Qingming Offering.description: Equip this weapon ornament to change the appearance of Jade Rabbit. Once you get an ornament, it's unlocked for all characters on your account.
Qingming Offering.name: Qingming Offering

Honor's Edge.description: "Good leadership requires discernment: the art of finely dividing one subtle thing from another." —Executor Hideo
Honor's Edge.name: Honor's Edge

Does Not Compute.description: The engineers aren't ready for us.
Does Not Compute.name: Does Not Compute

The Huckleberry.description: Nothin' in the world that 30 rounds can't solve.
The Huckleberry.name: The Huckleberry

Persuader.description: "They say you can't reason with these enemies. I dunno—my gun and I seem to manage just fine." —Kei-Ying
Persuader.name: Persuader

Belfry Bounty.description: "Making guns helps the hours pass. Especially since Suraya never calls…" —Devrim Kay
Belfry Bounty.name: Belfry Bounty

Imperative.description: "We must stop the weavers before they seal the Garden and begin to summon back its heart." —Ikora Rey
Imperative.name: Imperative

Calusea Noblesse.description: "A Reefborn long rifle, rewritten with Hive voices to arm Gahlran the failed. Now yours." —Emperor Calus
Calusea Noblesse.name: Calusea Noblesse

Cuboid ARu.description: What is the shape of reality?
Cuboid ARu.name: Cuboid ARu

Refrain-23.description: SUROS invites you to do it again.
Refrain-23.name: Refrain-23

Ros Lysis II.description: Here is a way to free your enemies from their earthly tethers.
Ros Lysis II.name: Ros Lysis II

Drang.description: Since the Collapse, these pistols have been retooled several times to boost their firepower. A worn inscription reads, "To Victor, from Sigrun."
Drang.name: Drang

Rat King.description: We are small, but we are legion.
Rat King.name: Rat King

Anarchy.description: "Stick to wall, ground, human… then FFFFFRRRRRYYYYY! Hehehehehehehe." —Siviks, Lost to None
Anarchy.name: Anarchy

Sacred Provenance.description: "These gifts were not made for us, but we were meant to have them." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3
Sacred Provenance.name: Sacred Provenance

New City.description: "That's what I see when I look at the Farm." —Devrim Kay
New City.name: New City

Atalanta-D.description: They will tell you that you can't. Don't listen to them.
Atalanta-D.name: Atalanta-D

Rose.description: In his strong hand the man held a Rose. And his aura burned bright.
Rose.name: Rose

Austringer.description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.
Austringer.name: Austringer

The Quickstep.description: SUROS invites you pick up the pace.
The Quickstep.name: The Quickstep

Cartesian Coordinate.description: Where does one end and the other begin?
Cartesian Coordinate.name: Cartesian Coordinate

Shock and Awe.description: Do not fear. Be what others fear.
Shock and Awe.name: Shock and Awe

Nox Echo III.description: Listen, and you will hear it.
Nox Echo III.name: Nox Echo III

Tarantula.description: No one will escape my web.
Tarantula.name: Tarantula

Ghost Primus.description: The Ghost Primus was strong because of his disfigurement, not in spite of it. He alone had the vision to share my dream of a new, perfect world. Ghaul was a creature of singular beauty, and I loved him.
Ghost Primus.name: Ghost Primus

Purpose.description: "You have not yet found your purpose. But it has found you." —Emissary of the Nine
Purpose.name: Purpose

Death Adder.description: You will not see me coming.
Death Adder.name: Death Adder

The Mornin' Comes.description: Fix your eye upon the rising sun.
The Mornin' Comes.name: The Mornin' Comes

Apex Predator.description: Is it you or I that tops the food chain, o challenger mine?
Apex Predator.name: Apex Predator

Headstrong.description: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.
Headstrong.name: Headstrong

Helios HC1.description: A standard issue Omolon weapon. City-made.
Helios HC1.name: Helios HC1

Kindled Orchid.description: Find the beauty in the flame.
Kindled Orchid.name: Kindled Orchid

Enigma's Draw.description: "Indeed, I traffic in all kinds of secrets and mysteries. Weapons, as well." —Lakshmi-2
Enigma's Draw.name: Enigma's Draw

Leviathan's Breath.description: "Cast a Shadow over the wilds of this universe. Return with glorious trophies." —Emperor Calus
Leviathan's Breath.name: Leviathan's Breath

Troubadour.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.
Troubadour.name: Troubadour

Luna Nullis II.description: The power you seek is in your hands.
Luna Nullis II.name: Luna Nullis II

Trondheim-LR2.description: Wide rivers. Cold winters. Old songs. Find a way.
Trondheim-LR2.name: Trondheim-LR2

Imminent Storm.description: It's going to get worse before it gets better.
Imminent Storm.name: Imminent Storm

Haunted Earth.description: "Those we've lost still linger in every place we look. Earth is no place for the living." —Arach Jalaal
Haunted Earth.name: Haunted Earth

Contingency Plan.description: "The Traveler is an illusion. A false god. It will not save us. But this might." —Arach Jalaal
Contingency Plan.name: Contingency Plan

Pillager.description: "No mercy out here. Can't afford it." —The Drifter
Pillager.name: Pillager

Subjunctive.description:
[u.1:01] Any given match there's twelve of us, tops. The Vex recommit to gardening Darkness, who says we've got enough guns to stop 'em?

[u.2:02] Stop 'em? Pretty sure our deaths are just meant to be the early warning system.
Subjunctive.name: Subjunctive

Traitor's Fate.description: The true Emperor of the Cabal invites you to strike down his faithless foe.
Traitor's Fate.name: Traitor's Fate

Older Sister III.description: "To protect us, as she once protected me." —Executor Hideo
Older Sister III.name: Older Sister III

Home Again.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.
Home Again.name: Home Again

Cydonia-AR1.description: A modded version of the Daito Cydonia, a Guardian standby.
Cydonia-AR1.name: Cydonia-AR1

SUROS Throwback.description: A heavily modded version of a SUROS prototype weapon.
SUROS Throwback.name: SUROS Throwback

Jiangshi AR1.description: A modded version of the Omolon Jiangshi, a Guardian standby.
Jiangshi AR1.name: Jiangshi AR1

Foggy Notion.description: "Hard to make it out, just a blur of bullets and fists."
Foggy Notion.name: Foggy Notion

Somerled-D.description: Heroes are not born, but made.
Somerled-D.name: Somerled-D

Zenith of Your Kind.description: "Earth has no Shadow. Not yet." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
Zenith of Your Kind.name: Zenith of Your Kind

Tyranny of Heaven.description: It was She that inspired me to imagine your destruction, o jailer mine.
Tyranny of Heaven.name: Tyranny of Heaven

Arc Logic.description: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.
Arc Logic.name: Arc Logic

Stay Away.description: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.
Stay Away.name: Stay Away

Distant Tumulus.description: "Who will speak for us when we are gone?" —Arach Jalaal
Distant Tumulus.name: Distant Tumulus

Blasphemer.description: "The logic is ineluctable: Those who die deserve oblivion." —Kuldax
Blasphemer.name: Blasphemer

Eulogy SI4.description: We are the eulogy of a lost civilization.
Eulogy SI4.name: Eulogy SI4

Bad Juju.description: "If you believe your weapon wants to end all existence, then so it will." —Toland the Shattered
Bad Juju.name: Bad Juju

The Defiant.description: "Do not let them distract you from your purpose!" —Lakshmi-2
The Defiant.name: The Defiant

Sonata-48.description: SUROS invites you to appreciate the classics.
Sonata-48.name: Sonata-48

Trax Dynia.description: A modified weapon from the Last City.
Trax Dynia.name: Trax Dynia

Judgment.description: "The greatest threat to a Guardian is another Guardian." —Emissary of the Nine
Judgment.name: Judgment

SUROS Regime.description: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.
SUROS Regime.name: SUROS Regime

Lionheart.description: The one thing they can never take away.
Lionheart.name: Lionheart

Rebuke AX-GL.description:
"I am the shadow that whispers in your…"

"Shut up, shadow."
Rebuke AX-GL.name: Rebuke AX-GL

Sturm.description: These ancient ceremonial pistols can be dated back to the early Golden Age. A faded inscription reads, "To Sigrun, from Victor."
Sturm.name: Sturm

Imperial Decree.description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.
Imperial Decree.name: Imperial Decree

Basilisk.description: The miracle worker for close-range ordnance.
Basilisk.name: Basilisk

Harsh Language.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.
Harsh Language.name: Harsh Language

Gareth-C.description: Your good heart will lead to great adventures.
Gareth-C.name: Gareth-C

Penumbra GSm.description: Will the long night ever end?
Penumbra GSm.name: Penumbra GSm

Living Memory.description: "Do you ever wonder who you were, before?"
Living Memory.name: Living Memory

Frostmire's Hex.description: "She loved nothing more than a good blizzard." —Lord Saladin
Frostmire's Hex.name: Frostmire's Hex

Crooked Fang-4fr.description: I sink my teeth into my prey.
Crooked Fang-4fr.name: Crooked Fang-4fr

Heretic.description: "Death is only and forever an ending. All else is sacrilege." —Kuldax
Heretic.name: Heretic

MIDA Mini-Tool.description: Select application: Flare gun. Water purifier. Interplanetary Positioning System. Encyclopædia Arcana. Personal flotation device. List continues.
MIDA Mini-Tool.name: MIDA Mini-Tool

Riskrunner.description: Charge your soul and let the electrons sing.
Riskrunner.name: Riskrunner

Tarrabah.description: We walk where our ancestors once walked.
Tarrabah.name: Tarrabah

Spare Rations.description: Whether times are lean or fat.
Spare Rations.name: Spare Rations

D.A.R.C.I..description: Thank you for using the Data Analysis, Reconnaissance, and Cooperative Intelligence device. You may call me Darci.
D.A.R.C.I..name: D.A.R.C.I.

Borealis.description: Light is a spectrum. Why limit yourself to a single hue?
Borealis.name: Borealis

Bite of the Fox.description: "Sometimes Skorri wouldn't show herself until she was the only one left who could stand." —Lord Saladin
Bite of the Fox.name: Bite of the Fox

Mos Ultima II.description: Find the summit and claim it for your own.
Mos Ultima II.name: Mos Ultima II

One Earth.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.
One Earth.name: One Earth

Minuet-12.description: A modded version of the SUROS Minuet-42, a Guardian standby.
Minuet-12.name: Minuet-12

Null Calamity 9.description:
A sacred eye that speaks in lies—upending futures in its path.
The way before us to the skies shall see itself in ancient wrath.
Null Calamity 9.name: Null Calamity 9

Izanagi's Burden.description: "Shame. Guilt. Fear. We all bear them. Gather your regrets, purge them as best you can. Let your enemies feel the weight of your burdens." —Ada-1
Izanagi's Burden.name: Izanagi's Burden

Home for the Lost.description: "I didn't expect to like it here. But the EDZ is growing on me." —Devrim Kay
Home for the Lost.name: Home for the Lost

Anonymous Autumn.description: A lesson in the art of falling.
Anonymous Autumn.name: Anonymous Autumn

Maxim XI.description: "Speak briefly and precisely, and what you say will penetrate to the heart." —Executor Hideo
Maxim XI.name: Maxim XI

Vouchsafe.description: "We knew it would not be easy." —Paladin Hallam Fen
Vouchsafe.name: Vouchsafe

Hadrian-A.description: You are the wall that defends the people.
Hadrian-A.name: Hadrian-A

Resilient People.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.
Resilient People.name: Resilient People

Truthteller.description: "If we wish others to accept the grim reality, we must break through every comforting illusion." —Arach Jalaal
Truthteller.name: Truthteller

Eye of Foresight.description: "To perceive the future from a great distance is both a gift and a promise of triumph." —Lakshmi-2
Eye of Foresight.name: Eye of Foresight

Jack Queen King 3.description:
An army meets, and stands, and falls. Three nobles wage their hopeless war.
In shifting madness, evil crawls. One stands above the battle's roar.
Jack Queen King 3.name: Jack Queen King 3

West of Sunfall 7.description:
A spark of knowledge with each fall, the purpose of the endless youth.
No longer shunned, dark's nameless call now brings about tenebrous truth.
West of Sunfall 7.name: West of Sunfall 7

Twilight Oath.description: Engraved in illuminated letters on the weapon's chassis: THE AWOKEN MADE ME.
Twilight Oath.name: Twilight Oath

A Single Clap.description: Hold your applause till the end.
A Single Clap.name: A Single Clap

Shepherd's Watch.description: Nobody talks about the day the Shepherd's staff became the Shepherd's rifle.
Shepherd's Watch.name: Shepherd's Watch

Thunderlord.description: They return from fields afar. The eye has passed, the end nears. Do not fade quietly. Let thunder reign again.
Thunderlord.name: Thunderlord

Inaugural Address.description: My first act as emperor was to send the Consul into the wasteland. The golden sun would burn away his corrupt form—a fitting symbol for the revolution that was to be my reign.
Inaugural Address.name: Inaugural Address

Memory Interdict.description: "I have no time for nostalgia. Give me visions of braided futures, brilliantly aflame." —Lakshmi-2
Memory Interdict.name: Memory Interdict

Death by Scorn.description: "The Barons fight together." —Elykris, transl. from Eliksni
Death by Scorn.name: Death by Scorn

Martyr's Make.description: Remember those who have gone before.
Martyr's Make.name: Martyr's Make

The Recluse.description: My bite will turn your sweet flesh to vile rot.
The Recluse.name: The Recluse

Trax Arda II.description: Light is the fire that burns away the blight.
Trax Arda II.name: Trax Arda II

Fare-Thee-Well.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.
Fare-Thee-Well.name: Fare-Thee-Well

Sea Scorpion-1sr.description: A prototype from VEIST, the City's newest weapon foundry.
Sea Scorpion-1sr.name: Sea Scorpion-1sr

Inverness-SR2.description: Stone walls. Dark storms. Ill omens. Stay awake.
Inverness-SR2.name: Inverness-SR2

Temporal Clause.description: the future narrows narrows narrows narrows
Temporal Clause.name: Temporal Clause

Alone as a god.description: I am the perfect loving god, and all will tremble to know me.
Alone as a god.name: Alone as a god

Reckless Oracle.description: "Knowing how it ends isn't the same as wanting it to be over." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3
Reckless Oracle.name: Reckless Oracle

The Chaperone.description: "My mother had a shotgun we called the Chaperone. Kept us alive out there before we got to the City." —Amanda Holliday
The Chaperone.name: The Chaperone

Lord of Wolves.description: By this right alone do I rule.
Lord of Wolves.name: Lord of Wolves

The Fool's Remedy.description: Forged in honor of Nirwen, and the righting of foolish wrongs.
The Fool's Remedy.name: The Fool's Remedy

Occluded Finality.description: Silence is better than unmeaning words.
Occluded Finality.name: Occluded Finality

Metronome-52.description: SUROS invites you to keep it steady.
Metronome-52.name: Metronome-52

Song of Justice VI.description: "Justice must be true, swift, and utterly impartial." —Executor Hideo
Song of Justice VI.name: Song of Justice VI

Crimson.description: According to official Vanguard policy, this weapon does not exist.
Crimson.name: Crimson

Nox Cordis II.description: Your first enemy is the darkness in your own heart.
Nox Cordis II.name: Nox Cordis II

Parsec TSu.description: Is it possible to measure the infinite?
Parsec TSu.name: Parsec TSu

Omniscient Eye.description: "I have seen too much. No one else should bear these burdens." —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3
Omniscient Eye.name: Omniscient Eye

The Cut and Run.description: "How do you think we got here?" —Avrok, trans. from Eliksni
The Cut and Run.name: The Cut and Run

Lumina.description: There must be meaning in my roar.
Lumina.name: Lumina

Randy's Throwing Knife.description: "On me, team; I'm capturing the third point!" —Randy, upon receiving orders not to
Randy's Throwing Knife.name: Randy's Throwing Knife

Fighting Lion.description: "I call it the Zhang Fei. It hits almost as hard as I do." —Wei Ning
Fighting Lion.name: Fighting Lion

Thistle and Yew.description: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.
Thistle and Yew.name: Thistle and Yew

Requiem-43.description: SUROS invites you to reflect upon the dead.
Requiem-43.name: Requiem-43

Lost and Found.description: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.
Lost and Found.name: Lost and Found

Tractor Cannon.description: Property of Ishtar Collective. WARNING: Gravity propulsor beam can cause serious injury or even death.
Tractor Cannon.name: Tractor Cannon

Le Monarque.description: "Wings flutter. Beauty distracts. Poison injects. The butterfly's curse extends to your enemies. A short life, shortened further by your hand." —Ada-1
Le Monarque.name: Le Monarque

Triumph DX-PR.description: "Even on the darkest days, victory is in sight."  —An optimist (or a liar)
Triumph DX-PR.name: Triumph DX-PR

Nanty Narker.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.
Nanty Narker.name: Nanty Narker

Graviton Lance.description: Think of space-time as a tapestry on a loom. This weapon is the needle.
Graviton Lance.name: Graviton Lance

Vigilance Wing.description: "The eye remains open. The Lighthouse remains lit." —Brother Vance
Vigilance Wing.name: Vigilance Wing

Crimil's Dagger.description: "She only wanted to help. I know that now." —Lord Saladin
Crimil's Dagger.name: Crimil's Dagger

Sins of the Past.description: What once was old shall be new again, and history will have its revenge.
Sins of the Past.name: Sins of the Past

Sleepless.description: "I see our path ahead, full of despair and hardship, and I will walk it with joy in my heart." —Sjur Eido
Sleepless.name: Sleepless

The Militia's Birthright.description: "Earth is our home. Not Mars, not Venus, not even the Reef. We must ensure it is a place we can continue to live for many generations to come." —Devrim Kay
The Militia's Birthright.name: The Militia's Birthright

Long Shadow.description: Inhale. Exhale. Flash of light. Endless fallout.
Long Shadow.name: Long Shadow

Pentatonic-48.description: SUROS invites you to light it up.
Pentatonic-48.name: Pentatonic-48

Morrigan-D.description: Your domain is the battlefield. Its ways are your ways.
Morrigan-D.name: Morrigan-D

Uriel's Gift.description: Take weapon in hand and fly to victory.
Uriel's Gift.name: Uriel's Gift

Solemn Hymn.description: Stand together and play the song that sounds across the stars.
Solemn Hymn.name: Solemn Hymn

Scathelocke.description: Our eyes squinted, our teeth clenched, our prayers answered.
Scathelocke.name: Scathelocke

Black Talon.description: "His life brought peace to the Reef. His death brings a sword." —Crows of the Black Hull
Black Talon.name: Black Talon

Galliard-42.description: SUROS invites you to kick up your heels.
Galliard-42.name: Galliard-42

Spiderbite-1si.description: A prototype from VEIST, the City's newest weapon foundry.
Spiderbite-1si.name: Spiderbite-1si

Transfiguration.description: Desire becomes reality, o wishbringer mine.
Transfiguration.name: Transfiguration

The Dream.description: "I dream of a world prepared to fight for its existence." —Lakshmi-2
The Dream.name: The Dream

The Number.description: "Ah, but which number? Why it and no others?" —Lakshmi-2
The Number.name: The Number

Minuet-42.description: SUROS invites you to join the dance.
Minuet-42.name: Minuet-42

Imset HC4.description: The City's foes ready themselves for the end.
Imset HC4.name: Imset HC4

Emperor's Courtesy.description: "A Reefborn riotgun, rewritten with Hive voices to aid Gahlran the failed. Now yours." —Emperor Calus
Emperor's Courtesy.name: Emperor's Courtesy

I Am Alive.description: "When the end comes, I reserve the right to be last." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
I Am Alive.name: I Am Alive

Royal Dispensation II.description: "New Monarchy believes in giving generously, like rain in spring." —Executor Hideo
Royal Dispensation II.name: Royal Dispensation II

The Guiding Sight.description: Forged in honor of Efrideet, and all that inspires.
The Guiding Sight.name: The Guiding Sight

The Colony.description: We outnumber you. We will find you. You are alone, and we are colony.
The Colony.name: The Colony

Conspirator.description: Did Ghaul always dream of a republic? What terrible worm burrowed into his heart that he would betray my love and plot against me?
Conspirator.name: Conspirator

Man o' War.description: Do not enter my realm and expect to leave unscathed.
Man o' War.name: Man o' War

Medley-45.description: SUROS invites you to serve up your greatest hits.
Medley-45.name: Medley-45

Loud Lullaby.description: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.
Loud Lullaby.name: Loud Lullaby

Mob Justice.description: Life offers few greater pleasures than to humiliate the venal aristocracy before a crowd. I am father to the people, and they shall adore me above all others.
Mob Justice.name: Mob Justice

Wrong Side of Right.description: The right thing, for the wrong reasons.
Wrong Side of Right.name: Wrong Side of Right

Thorn.description: "To rend one's enemies is to see them not as equals, but objects—hollow of spirit and meaning." —13th Understanding, 7th Book of Sorrow
Thorn.name: Thorn

Sol Pariah 6.description:
Amid the endless death one flew—unnatural all-consuming need—
And in the space between the two, accursed comprehension freed.
Sol Pariah 6.name: Sol Pariah 6

The Conqueror 2.description:
To Tower comes a war in red; an orphan sounds the empire's call.
Mortal angels mourn the dead while lightless light wraps night in pall.
The Conqueror 2.name: The Conqueror 2

The Mountaintop.description: "In the heat of battle, Guardian, you will know the right choice to make." —Lord Shaxx
The Mountaintop.name: The Mountaintop

Every Waking Moment.description: "Even my idle thoughts are haunted." —Eris Morn
Every Waking Moment.name: Every Waking Moment

Prophet of Doom.description: "You know how this will end." —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3
Prophet of Doom.name: Prophet of Doom

Sleeper Simulant.description: Subroutine IKELOS: Status=complete. MIDNIGHT EXIGENT: Status=still in progress.
Sleeper Simulant.name: Sleeper Simulant

Monte Carlo.description: There will always be paths to tread and methods to try. Roll with it.
Monte Carlo.name: Monte Carlo

Techeun Force.description: Sworn into faithful service to the Queen, the Techeuns of the Reef have long protected the secrets of the Awoken.
Techeun Force.name: Techeun Force

Pit Launcher.description: Let everyone fear the gaping maw.
Pit Launcher.name: Pit Launcher

Accrued Redemption.description: "I should never have let it come to this. Now each arrow is a penance." —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3
Accrued Redemption.name: Accrued Redemption

Divinity.description: Calibrate reality. Seek inevitability. Embody divinity.
Divinity.name: Divinity

Nox Veneris II.description: Night comes for us. We are not ready.
Nox Veneris II.name: Nox Veneris II

Elatha FR4.description: The sun shines on both joy and grief.
Elatha FR4.name: Elatha FR4

Mindbender's Ambition.description: "Hiraks always did like to leave an impression." —The Spider
Mindbender's Ambition.name: Mindbender's Ambition

The Epicurean.description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.
The Epicurean.name: The Epicurean

Hard Light.description: Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.
Hard Light.name: Hard Light

Go Figure.description: Can't let the Shore get you down.
Go Figure.name: Go Figure

Hand in Hand.description: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.
Hand in Hand.name: Hand in Hand

Ded Acumen II.description: Wisdom is the greatest power, the dearest treasure.
Ded Acumen II.name: Ded Acumen II

Ded Nemoris II.description: You will find your way out of this forest.
Ded Nemoris II.name: Ded Nemoris II

Heart of Time.description: "Perhaps it exists. Perhaps it does not. Either we shall find it, or we shall become it." —Lakshmi-2
Heart of Time.name: Heart of Time

Outrageous Fortune.description: No accounting for where it will fall.
Outrageous Fortune.name: Outrageous Fortune

Steel Sybil Z-14.description:
"Everything I touch falls apart! I see the fragments on the floor!"

"Well, isn't that a good thing? You know, if you're a sword?"
Steel Sybil Z-14.name: Steel Sybil Z-14

Beloved.description: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.
Beloved.name: Beloved

Zephyr.description: In the cold of winter, we remember that the warm west wind will blow again.
Zephyr.name: Zephyr

Sunrise GL4.description: Do not wait for the sun to rise.
Sunrise GL4.name: Sunrise GL4

Exit Strategy.description: "If you don't got one, it's time to make one." —The Drifter
Exit Strategy.name: Exit Strategy

D.F.A..description: "Osiris said that he started to pity the Red Legion, getting trapped in here for infinite eternities. I think they're getting exactly what they deserve." —Sagira
D.F.A..name: D.F.A.

Skyburner's Oath.description: The inscription, written in a Cabal dialect, reads: "Victory or death!"
Skyburner's Oath.name: Skyburner's Oath

Multimach CCX.description: Friends are as companions on a journey who ought to aid each other to persevere.
Multimach CCX.name: Multimach CCX

The Domino.description: "Who will be the first to fall?" —Lakshmi-2
The Domino.name: The Domino

The Emperor's Envy.description: The son's ambition will be his undoing.
The Emperor's Envy.name: The Emperor's Envy
